name: Jupiter III
details:
Impact & light controlled analog percussion synthesizer:: Make analog transmissions from the palm of your hand
Whether making alien transmissions, or bringing your music into another dimension, Jupiter III will take you there & beyond. J3 is a unique, handheld, fully-analog synth/space drum and optical-theremin. It's thick, old-skool, analog sound suits many genres of music, as well as the most out-there sonic explorations. 
:: It can be played three ways:
1) by tapping the case, like a drum, via it’s internal piezo pickup
2) like a theremin via it’s onboard photo-sensor
3) triggered by any external sound source, including drum machine, metronome (included) or mp3 player
Jupiter III is handbuilt to last, with only the finest components & construction, and does what some bigger, analog synths can do, but in the palm of your hand, or on the desktop. Designed for the producer & live performer who want portable, big, analog sound, without the steep learning curve and high price tag.
Each unit is signed, dated and numbered by COS, and comes with a free MeIdeal mini-metronome.
:: Features:
• Handmade in the USA
• fully analog circuitry
• 2 oscillators with individual controls
• internal piezo pickup
• photocell for optical theremin mode
• triggered by any audio source
• LFO, Decay & Sweep controls
• LED power indicator
• Powered by 9V adapter or battery
• durable powder-coated aluminum case
• solid construction & components
• 1/4″ output and 1/4″ trigger input
• comes in orange or green sparkle
